div.p: All authors shared responsibility for writing the manuscript and of the general concept that is developed. H.G. and J.E.K. conceived and supervised the study. H.S.P. and A.J. lead the preparation of Fig. 1. A.J. prepared Fig. 2 and wrote the text devoted to it. K.C.A. supplied Fig. 3 and contributed to the discussion of the links with radiative feedbacks in collaboration with all authors. O.L. and H.G. were in charge of the discussion of ice production-entrainment feedback (Figs. 4 and 5). F.M and M.V. wrote the section devoted to the sea ice growth-thickness feedback (including Supplementary Fig. 2). Supplementary Fig. 1 was performed and discussed by A.B.-S. D.D. was responsible of Table 1, with inputs of all authors.
